Datasets on poverty in Our World in Data.

### About this data
This file contains two datasets:

 - World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (PIP)
 - Michalis Moatsos estimations on historical poverty between 1820 and 2018 (2021).

Each dataset has its own dedicated folder with details on the methodology and the variables included. Please check the respective README files for more information on this.
